prepare

  • prepare(point: VectorE3, points: Vector3[]): VectorE3
    • Defined in geometries/PolyhedronBuilder.ts:32

    Modifies the incoming point by projecting it onto the unit sphere. Add the point to the array of points Sets a hidden index property to the index in points Computes the texture coordinates and sticks them in the hidden uv property as a Vector2. OK!
